questions.question_text: I work with data that is always reliable and correct
What data is NOT always reliable and correct?
responses: Budget
HR master data
Values of different items and tasks
As different functions sometimes have different de…ross-functional comparison is sometimes difficult
Theoretically similar data definitions are different across geographies
Supplier data is often incomplete or lacking at all

questions.question_text: I know how we define data quality at STARTUP-CORP
I know our data compliance rules at STARTUP-CORP
I have the right tools & software to work with data
Which one do you think is missing?
responses: None
Values of different items and tasks
A software based support that holistically/across functions supports to prioritize data use cases
Scientific databases and journals should be made easily accessible without long approval processes
Carbon software
It is not directly a tool, but access to some anonymized employee performance data would be great
PowerBI
Platform for data sharing with external parties in both directions.
A tool that helps to better get insights into our machine generated data
(Semi-automated) CO2 accounting tool
A tool that supports automated consolidation of different financial statements etc
I dont use many tools in my daily work. But for m…m, some customization in the CRM would be helpful
I would need some more support for an AI based pri…- I truly believe we can generate more value here
Some suppot for AI-based candidate screening during recruiting process
Modern CRM
Access to emission factor databases (e.g., climatiq, Ecoinvent)
Tableau
Automated data bundling/aggregation for CO2 calculation
Alteryx
I dunno

responses: Data quality evaluation
Analytics in BI tools
Data visualization
Analytics
